title: How to level up on lol boards?
body: I wanted to comment on a post but couldn't because I needed to be level 7 on the website. I've been searching but only found one post about this but it was someone else having the same issue, so how do I level up on lol boards.

replies.body: Every once and awhile someone's account doesn't seem to sync up correctly on this side of things. Usually posting here in H&S will force a manual sync through, which must have worked because I can see you as level 41 now ^_^
I am also having the same problem.  Hopefully this post manually syncs my account and shows my true lvl of 53
don't mind me , im only commenting to check if that helps my issue . (it says im level 2 for some reason) .
Sometimes it takes a while to get the boards to sync to your in-game level. Usually posting will do so, and I see you at level 41, so it looks like that did it.
